name: daily-recap
summary: Generate a daily recap image with your agent holding a posterboard of accomplishments
description: A cron-driven skill that reviews your agent's daily memory files and accomplishments, then generates a custom image of your agent holding a posterboard with the day's wins. Includes weather-appropriate attire and time-of-day lighting based on current conditions.
author: dbhurley

RECAP_TIME.description: Time for daily cron in 24h format
